resources.string: Convert a number from one radix into another.
Number has more than one decimal point.

With 0xCAFE you can convert numbers from one radix into another. The App got its name from programming languages like C, where a hex number starts with 0x. Therefore the expression \'0xCAFE\' is a valid number in C, with the decimal value 51966, try it out :)
This app is available opensource under https://zeroxcafe.googlecode.com
